attributes.action: Recognise the Coogathlon as full olympic sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Coogathlon is an hexathlon event cosisting of bowling, poker, darts, snooker and pool. It has been running for 6 years and deserves full governmental recognition and allowed as an olympic event

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
